description:
Approval of Details pursuant to conditions 5 (Proposed Construction Site Plan), 7(Construction Environment Management Plan) and 11( Management Plan) of planning permission reference: P2018/1231/FUL, for Proposed single storey extension to the south east corner of the existing school building as an expansion of the existing after school facilities including a Reception Office, Library, Meeting Rooms, Teaching Kitchen and WCs and store rooms including new separate accessible entrance (following demolition of existing single storey building) 
approved on 16/05/2019.
decision_conditions: The applicant should be reminded that the nearby Rosa Alba Mews residents are particularly concerned about visitors leaving after Saturday and late events. Particular attention should be drawn to the careful stewarding of visitors leaving away from the residential properties and towards Highbury Park after all events, but with particular effort to be made after those later events.
site_name: St Joan Of Arc Primary School
